verses.verse: Now it happened after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Yahweh, <WH3068> that Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> Moses <WH4872>' servant, <WH8334> saying, <WH559>

"Moses <WH4872> my servant <WH5650> is dead; <WH4191> now therefore arise, <WH6965> go over <WH5674> this Jordan, <WH3383> you, <WH5971> and all this people, to the land <WH776> which I give <WH5414> to them, <WH1121> even to the children of Israel. <WH3478>
I have given <WH5414> you every place <WH4725> that the sole <WH3709> of your foot <WH7272> will tread on, <WH1869> as I told <WH1696> Moses. <WH4872>

From the wilderness, <WH4057> and this Lebanon, <WH3844> even to the great <WH1419> river, <WH5104> the river <WH5104> Euphrates, <WH6578> all the land <WH776> of the Hittites, <WH2850> and to the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> toward the going down <WH3996> of the sun, <WH8121> shall be your border. <WH1366>

No man <WH376> will be able to stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> you all the days <WH3117> of your life. <WH2416> As I was with Moses, <WH4872> so I will be with you. <WH7503> I will not fail you nor forsake you. <WH5800>
"Be strong <WH2388> and courageous; <WH553> for you shall cause this people <WH5971> to inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> which I swore <WH7650> to their fathers <WH1> to give them. <WH5414>

Only be strong <WH2388> and very <WH3966> courageous, <WH553> to observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> according to all the law, <WH8451> which Moses <WH4872> my servant <WH5650> commanded <WH6680> you. <WH5493> Don't turn from it to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left, <WH8040> that you may have good success <WH7919> wherever you go. <WH3212>

This book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> shall not depart <WH4185> out of your mouth, <WH6310> but you shall meditate <WH1897> on it day <WH3119> and night, <WH3915> that you may observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> according to all that is written <WH3789> therein: <WH6743> for then you shall make your way <WH1870> prosperous, <WH6743> and then you shall have good success. <WH7919>

Haven't <WH6680> I commanded you? <WH2388> Be strong and courageous. <WH553> Don't <WH6206> be afraid, neither be dismayed: <WH2865> for Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> is with you wherever you go. <WH3212>"
Then Joshua <WH3091> commanded <WH6680> the officers <WH7860> of the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559>

"Pass <WH5674> through <WH7130> the midst of the camp, <WH4264> and command <WH6680> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> <WH3559> 'Prepare food; <WH6720> for within three <WH7969> days <WH3117> you are to pass over <WH5674> this Jordan, <WH3383> to go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> the land, <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you to possess it. <WH3423>'"
Joshua <WH3091> spoke <WH559> to the Reubenites, <WH7206> and to the Gadites, <WH1425> and to the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> saying, <WH559>

"Remember <WH2142> the word <WH1697> which Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> you, <WH559> saying, <WH3068> 'Yahweh your God <WH430> gives you rest, <WH5117> and will give <WH5414> you this land. <WH776>

Your wives, <WH802> your little ones, <WH2945> and your livestock, <WH4735> shall live <WH3427> in the land <WH776> which Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> you beyond <WH5676> the Jordan; <WH3383> but you shall pass <WH5674> over before <WH6440> your brothers <WH251> armed, <WH2571> all the mighty <WH1368> men of valor, <WH2428> and shall help them <WH5826>

until Yahweh <WH3068> has given <WH5117> your brothers <WH251> rest, <WH5117> as he has given <WH5117> you, <WH3423> and they have also possessed the land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> them. <WH7725> Then you shall return to the land <WH776> of your possession, <WH3425> and possess it, <WH4872> which Moses the servant <WH5650> of Yahweh <WH3068> gave <WH5414> you beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> toward the sunrise. <WH4217>'"
They answered <WH6030> Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559> "All that you have commanded <WH6680> us we will do, <WH6213> and wherever <WH834> you send <WH7971> us we will go. <WH3212>
Just as we listened <WH8085> to Moses <WH4872> in all things, <WH8085> so will we listen to you. <WH3068> Only may Yahweh your God <WH430> be with you, <WH4872> as he was with Moses.

Whoever <WH376> rebels <WH4784> against your commandment, <WH6310> and doesn't <WH8085> listen to your words <WH1697> in all that you command <WH6680> him, <WH4191> he shall be put to death. Only be strong <WH2388> and courageous. <WH553>"
